_header: That was my woe is now my most gladness
_description: Paradoxes of a servant of love — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd5465.Editions:
Burney,  Charles. 
             A General History of Music….
         London: T. Beckett, J. Robson, and G. Robinson, 1782: 2.546-7.
Flügel,  Ewald,
                        ed.  
             Neuenglisches Lesebuch.
         1 Bd. Halle: Niemayer, 1895: 142.
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Music and Poetry in the Early Tudor Court.
         London: Methuen, 1961: 356.

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
That was my woo ys now my most gladnesÞat was my payne is nowe
                    my ioly chaunce…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…Wherefore I am & shal be tyll I dyeYour trewe seruaunt
                    withthouȝt hert & bodye
BLAdd60577.Note: ‘ij partes’ written in left margin beside this.
